  • Method Details

    • setCard

      public int setCard​(Card card) throws OutOfBoundException
      Add a card chosen by the challenger to the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - the chosen card.
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundException - if the current size of the array is equals to the number of players.

    • getCards

      public java.util.List<Card> getCards()
      Returns:
      the content of the deck in ArrayList type.

    • chooseCard

      public boolean chooseCard​(Card card, VirtualClient client)
      Remove a card afterwards a player god-power choice.
      Parameters:
      card - the card selected by the player.
      Returns:
      true if everything is ok, false otherwise.

    • chooseCard

      public boolean chooseCard​(Card card, VirtualClient client, TurnController controller)
      Remove a card afterwards a player god-power choice in case of Athena selection.
      Parameters:
      card - the selected card.
      client - the client which has selected Athena.
      controller - the game controller.
      Returns:
      true if everything is ok, false otherwise.
